| If the {{domxref("MediaSource.readyState", "readyState")}} property of the parent {{domxref("MediaSource")}} is set to "ended", calling changeType() | will set the readyState property to"open" and > | fire a simple event named {{domxref("MediaSource.sourceopen_event", "sourceopen")}} at the parent media source. ^ |

|

Browser compatibility

{{Compat}}

title: SourceBuffer: changeType() method
summary:
The changeType() method of the
  SourceBuffer interface sets the MIME type that future calls to
  appendBuffer() should expect the new media
  data to conform to. This makes it possible to change codecs or container type
  mid-stream.
pageTitle: SourceBuffer: changeType() method - Web APIs | MDN
